ygData.subject: Re: Anachronox
ygData.msgSnippet: Belthassan, not being stupid, realizes something went wrong. He takes Anachronox s hand and shakes it, but he does so absent-mindingly. Belthassan: Tell me,

Belthassan, not being stupid, realizes something went wrong. He takes 
Anachronox's hand and shakes it, but he does so absent-mindingly.

Belthassan: Tell me, Anachronox, where are you from? How did you 
arrive here?

If what he thought was right, he had been created by the Renewal 
Chamber itself, from Firedrill. Daemos would have to deal with all the 
diplomatic problems that would come from this...

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> -- Anachronox --
> 
> Anachronox loosens up and stands. "Hello Beltassan, second in 
command 
> of the Tripredacus. Who is the ambassador?" he replies as he offers 
> Belthassan a hand.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Belthassan still looked somewhat stunned from the accident.
> > 
> > Belthassan: If that is what you mean, I mean no harm. I am 
> > Belthassan, second in command of the Tripredacus. I would like to 
> > know who you are, as well as what happened to the ambassador.
